sign.out.error: Error while signing out the user.
id.charSet.description: the character set used to create the ID. Default is (A-Za-z0-9_-).
id.length.description: The length of the generated ID. Default is 21
bool.min.description: The minimum value range for random boolean generated
bool.max.description: The maximum value range for random boolean generated
decay.min.description: The floor value for the decay
decay.max.description: The ceiling (starting point) for the decay
float.precision.description: The precision of the float value
int.min.description: The minimum value for the random integer generated
int.max.description: The maximum value for the random integer generated
location.lat.description: The latiude of the center position for the random coordinates to be generated
location.long.description: The longitude of the center position for the random coordinates to be generated
location.radius.description: The radius from the center position for the random coordinates to be generated (in meters)
string.min.description: The minimum length of the random string generated
string.max.description: The maximum length of the random string generated
sinusoidal.min.description: The minimum value for the sinusoidal curve
sinusoidal.max.description: The maximum value for the sinusoidal curve
timestamp.tsformat.description: The format of the timestamp to send in the payload
pickone.arr.description: The array of values from which one value is randomly picked. (comma seperated values)
default.description: The default value will consistently be the value sent with this attribute
static.description: The data value generated only once per simulation
name: Name
simulation.name: Simulation name
device.type.name: Device type name
device.type.name.description: The common name of the device type
interval.description: How often devices will send data during a simulation in seconds
duration.description: How long the device will simulate sending data to the defined data topic in seconds
create.simulation.description: Create a custom simulation to run
topic.description: The topic where the individual sensor data will be sent
payload.description: Define the message payload that will be simulated for the device type
device.type.create.description: Create a device type with a customized payload
attribute.name: Attribute name
range.error: The minimum value must be less than the maximum value
min.error: Must be greater than or equal to
max.error: Must be less than or equal to
name.error: Name should contain only alphanumeric characters, hyphens, and underscores.
topic.error: Topic can not contain any wildcard characters (+ or #).
interval.error: Interval must be less than duration
error.message.title: Message
simulation.type.description: The simulation type defines which device types may be used. User created simulations only allow the use of custom user created device types while the automotive demo simulations only allow the use of automotive demo device types.
device.exceed.error: Exceeds limit of 100 devices total per simulation
no.device.types: There are no device types to display
no.simulations: There are no simulations to display
if.device.type.created: If a device type has already been created
confirm.delete.title: Confirm delete
confirm.delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete
duplicate.device.error: Device type is already being used, can not have duplicate device types
